© Copyright Jamie Smith, 2013–present. All rights reserved. Privacy policy.

Privacy policy

This website and game (“Tripods”) is hosted on Netlify. Netlify keeps server access logs for a maximum of 30 days. These logs include Personally Identifiable Information (PII) such as IP addresses. Netlify states that its services are GDPR compliant. (Source: Netlify’s commitment to protect your data.)

Cookies and analytics

This site does not use cookies or third-party analytics.

There are some basic and completely anonymous in-game analytics. Each item in the log comprises a timestamp, whether the level has been started or completed, and in the case of the latter what the score was. None of the stats are linked to any particular player.

Other data

A record of your scores is stored in the browser on your device so that you can keep track of progress.

This policy was last updated on 19 January 2023.

This game works best in portrait orientation.
